head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BAGGER, DONALD H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BAGGER, DONALD H.

block.p: BAGGER-Donald H. Of Mountainside, NJ. Devoted husband of Elizabeth (Broback) Bagger. Beloved father of Paula M. Bagger of Hingham, Mass., Jonathan A. Bagger of Baltimore, MD, Richard H. Bagger of Westfield, NJ and Matthew C. Bagger of New York City. Also survived by eight granddaughters. Loving brother of Doris B. Marsh of Marblehead, Mass. and the late N. Bruce Bagger. Relatives and friends are invited to attend a memorial service at St. Paul's Episcopal Church, 414 E Broad St, Westfield, NJ at noon on Saturday, October 21st. In lieu of flowers, contributions to the Donald H. Bagger Memorial Fund of the Westfield Foundation would be appreciated.
